instrument.name: Guitar
instrument.description: The guitar is a musical instrument classified as a fretted string instrument with anywhere from four to 18 strings, usually having six.

instrument.name: Piano
instrument.description: The piano is an acoustic, stringed musical instrument invented around the year 1700 in which the strings are struck by hammers.

instrument.name: Saxophone
instrument.description: The saxophone (also referred to as the sax) is a family of woodwind instruments. Saxophones are usually made of brass and played with a single-reed mouthpiece similar to that of the clarinet.
